events.message: The customer reported a car accident that occurred at an intersection, resulting in significant damage to the front bumper and headlight of their vehicle.
Claim has been categorised under Auto Accident based on the reported details mentioning vehicle collision and damage.
An insurance claims agent was assigned to handle the case and contact the claimant for further information.
The claim has been acknowledged and the claimant was informed that the case is under review for prompt assistance.
The agent requested the customer to submit the police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and the insurance policy documents.
The claimant submitted all requested documents including the accident police report and several photos of the vehicle's damage.
The investigation team has initiated a thorough review of the accident report and vehicle damage assessment.
The investigation concluded that the other party was at fault and the damage to the claimant’s vehicle is covered under policy terms.
A settlement amount was proposed to cover the full repair cost for the front bumper and headlight replacement.
The claimant expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and appreciated the quick response from their agent.
The claim was formally approved by the claims department following customer acceptance of the proposed settlement.
Payment for the approved settlement was processed and issued to the customer’s account for vehicle repairs.
The claim has been officially closed after customer confirmation that the vehicle repairs were satisfactorily completed.
